entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 10 April 2023
